sections.text: The sheriff, either personally or by deputy, shall serve process and execute orders directed to him pursuant to law.

2009 Repeal.

Subchapter C (§§ 2941 - 2950) was added June 15, 1994, P.L.265, No.44, and repealed October 9, 2009, P.L.494, No.49, effective in 60 days. The subject matter is now contained in Chapter 71 of Title 44 (Law and Justice).
